subsection.name: Using Configuration Overrides
subsection.p: The Merlin command line tool allows the specification of a set of overriding configuration targets. Each target in the <targets> set contains a configuration that may be applied to a named component. This allows modification of a configuration without modification of a packaged block.xml file.
Resources supporting this tutorial are contained in the tutorials/configuration/override directory.
